creditline: Gift of Henry White Cannon Jr., Class of 1910, in memory of his father

texts.textentryhtml: Robert Langton Douglas (1864-1951), London; Purchased from him by Jean Paul Richter (1847-1937) in London in October 1912 for £200 for Henry White Cannon (1850-1934), Fiesole; by descent to his son, Henry (Harry) W. Cannon, Jr. (1887-1966), Class of 1910; Donated to the Museum in 1935.

caption: Niccolo Giolfino (Italian, 1476–ca. 1555), Chiomara and the Centurion. Oil (?) on wood panel; 27 x 33 cm, 40.6 x 47 x 5.1 cm (frame). Gift of Henry White Cannon Jr., Class of 1910, in memory of his father (y1935-30)
